headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Taxi Work Rewards
content:
Few understand the veins and arteries of a city quite like its taxi drivers, and Los Santos is no different.

Determined cabbies get 2X GTA$ on Taxi Job Tips this week, and through February 8 can earn rare items for safely ferrying their clientele including the Downtown Cab Co. Revere Collar shirt, 100K GTA$, and more.

Clothing rewards will be delivered to your wardrobe by February 17, GTA$ rewards will be delivered within 72 hours of completion.
